title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2651.8 - Amount of grants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2651.8 - Amount of grants

State Regulations

State aid shall consist of 50 percent of the net cost of
the housing code enforcement program limited to the sum appropriated therefor
by the Legislature. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2651.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
